summary: Federal agencies help fund small businesses' technology development through grants and other awards. This Q&A report looked at a pilot program that could provide more funding for small businesses to bring their technologies to the market. Since the pilot began in 2018, only the Department of Energy's Office of Science has used it. Other agencies didn't implement the pilot as required because they don't work...
title: Small Business Innovation Research: Most Agencies Did Not Implement Required Commercialization Pilot
